changelog:
* Trezor Model T now supports Solana, expanding the range of cryptocurrencies it can securely manage. [Universal fw only] 
* Ethereum fees are now uniformly presented in Gwei, enhancing clarity and consistency for users. [Universal fw only] 
* The display of spaced addresses has been refined, offering a more user-friendly and visually optimized experience. 
* Boot-up logo display has been optimized, contributing to a smoother and more visually appealing device startup.
